name: Clive Sturridge's Battle Defense Legacy Collection
name_original: Clive Sturridge's Battle Defense Legacy Collection
description:
Britain's Top Game Designer is Back!

The world's most prominent designer, Sir Clive Sturridge is back in this brand new collection of 5 games from his iconic Battlement Defence series of games. Follow Sir Sir Clive's career, from his humble beginnings making games for the ZX Spectrum, through to his crowdfunded revival, and look into the future as Sir Clive dives into high-concept indie gaming.

Clive Sturridge's Battle Defense Legacy Collection was a game created for the Awful Summer Jam 2018 game jam, themed "Unnecessary Sequels." 

Credits

Alligator - art, concept, programming, writing, voice acting
HardClumping - audio, writing
LilPP - audio
sponge - concept, programming, writing

Technology Used

SDL - little bit of everything
Wren - embedded scripting language
NanoVG - 2d graphics
PhysicsFS - virtual filesystem
dear imgui - debugging tools
SoLoud - audio engine
TMX C Loader - loading Tiled maps
JFXR - bleeps and bloops

Engine and game source code are available at GitHub.
